attributes.action: Make It Compulsory For Animal Abusers To Be Recorded On An Animal Abuse Register
attributes.additional_details:
The Link Between Animal Abuse and Human Abuse:

https://protectallwildlifeblog.wordpress.com/animal-abuse-and-human-abuse-the-partners-in-crime/
http://www.peta.org/issues/companion-animal-issues/companion-animals-factsheets/animal-abuse-human-abuse-partners-crime/
https://www.psychologytoday.com/blog/why-the-wild-things-are/201302/do-mass-killers-start-out-harming-pets
http://truththeory.com/2016/03/04/why-the-fbi-now-categorizes-animal-cruelty-as-a-class-a-felony/
attributes.background: I ask that it becomes law that an Animal Abuse Register is brought into place and that all offenders are placed on this register. I also ask that offenders are barred from keeping or working with animals for a minimum period of 10 years if not lifelong.
